member.name: NMREBARCHILDSIZE
member.summary: Contains information used in handling the RBN_CHILDSIZE notification code.

member.name: NMREBARCHILDSIZE.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains additional information about the notification.

member.name: NMREBARCHILDSIZE.uBand
member.summary: Zero-based index of the band affected by the notification. This will be -1 if no band is affected.

member.name: NMREBARCHILDSIZE.rcChild
member.summary: structure that contains the new size of the child window. This member can be changed during the notification to modify the child window's position and size.

member.name: NMREBARCHILDSIZE.rcBand
member.summary: structure that contains the new size of the band.
